text: Ramona Singer and Bethenny Frankel have definitely had beef throughout the seasons and now the The Real Housewives of New York City ladies no longer really consider themselves to be friends. Ramona elaborated on their issues and gave a hint as to what's to come on the reunion when talking to Daryn Carp on Bravo's Weekly Pregame. ` ` I'm at this Halloween party and she tells me,'Don't talk to me until you're a success,'' Ramona said. ` ` I mean, all of us women on the show were very successful even before we did the show.
